name: PuZeL
description:
PuZeL

A Mind-Blowing Riddle Games. Try Solve All 5 Riddles. Or Is It 6 ?. 

Features :

  • All Riddles Was Carefully Crafted.
  • Different Solving For Different Riddles.
  • Created With Twine.
  • Can Be Played On Any Platform.
  • Also. It's Free !   :)

Will You Be Able To Complete All The Riddles ?. Or Ended Giving Up ?. Why Don't You Try It First. :).

Difficulty : Normal.

Additional Notes :

This Was My First Riddle-Solving Style Games. Glad I Can Create One. :D.

Created With Twine By Using My Android Device. :)

Here Is The Video When I Code This Game. I Code This Game While I Playing RTS Game At The Same Time !. It's Kinda Crazy Ideas. But At Least I Complete It !. :D.

Also. Let Me Know Is The Riddle Is Easy, Hard, Or Just Right !.

Thanks For Playing !. :)
